Package hu.klenium.tetris.view.window

Class GameFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.klenium.tetris.view.window.GameFrame
  • public class GameFrame
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates and maintains the layout used by a game, responds to events caused by the game's player.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas boardCanvas
      The canvas which is used to display the board.
      private javafx.scene.Scene scene
      The application's scene, used to create and store GUI elements, add event handlers.
      private javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas tetrominoCanvas
      The canvas which is used to draw the falling tetromino.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GameFrame​(javafx.scene.Scene scene)
      Creates a new frame for a new game in the window.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameFrame

        public GameFrame​(javafx.scene.Scene scene)
        Creates a new frame for a new game in the window. Builds all GUI elements used by the new game, and adds them to the scene.
        Parameters:
        scene - The JavaFX application's scene which is used to build/store new elements.

    • Method Detail

      • getBoardCanvas

        public javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas getBoardCanvas()

      • getTetrominoCanvas

        public javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas getTetrominoCanvas()

      • registerEventListeners

        public void registerEventListeners​(TetrisGame game)
        Adds event handler to the scene. When one of the specificed keys is pressed, sends the corresponding command to game.
        Parameters:
        game - The game which will recieve a command on user input.

      • setSize

        public void setSize​(int width,
                    int height)
        Sets the fram's size, based on the board's size. Also resizes the window to fit the content.
        Parameters:
        width - The frame's width.
        height - The frame's height.
